      • resolveAccount

        public AccountDetails resolveAccount(java.lang.String settlementBank,
                                     java.lang.String accountNumber)
                              throws org.json.JSONException,
                                     InvalidInputException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Returns the details of an accountNumber. The bankId, AccountName and AccountNumber;
        The settlementBank parameter should be the code for a particular bank e.g: 011 for First Bank PLC.
        Parameters:
        settlementBank -
        accountNumber -
        Returns:
        Throws:
